newsitem.title: EU: EP FOREIGN AFFAIRS COMMITTEE AGENDA - OCT 29-30.
newsitem.headline: EP FOREIGN AFFAIRS COMMITTEE AGENDA - OCT 29-30.

text.p: Committee on Foreign Affairs, Security and Defence Policy [[ Tuesday 29 October 1996 ]] Public meeting (3) 0. 1. Adoption of draft agenda (PE 219.007 ) 2. Chairman's announcements 3. Approval of minutes of meetings of: - 24-25 September 1996 (Brussels) (PE 219.806 ) 4. Activitiesd security policy: information and consultation (4) 5. Activities of the joint parliamentary committees and interparliamentary dele gations 6. Human rights in the world (T04545) COS0435 5468/96 C4-0410/96 + POLI Fond R LALUMIERE Catherine. (PE218.638 ) (ARE) - Exchange of views 7. The European Union and Latin America: the present situation and prospects fo r closer partnership, 1996-2000 (T042I Fond R BERTENS Jan W. (ELD) (PE218.999 ) - Exchange of views 8. Strategy in respect of Central America (T04498) COS0392 COM(95)0600 C4-0102/96 + POLI Fond R CARNERO GONZ uLEZ C. (GUE) (PE219.805 ) - Exchange of views 9. Partnership and cooperation agreement between the EC and Russia (T04900) AVC96106 COM(96)0150 + POLI Fond R CARRERE D'ENCAUSSE H (UPE) (PE218.998 ) - Adoption of draft report 10. Linking relief, rehabilitation and development (LRRD) (T03955) COS0419 COM(96)0153 C4-0265/96 + POLI Avis A DUPUIS Olivier. (ARE) (PE219.009 ) F DEVE Fond R FASSA Raimondo. (ELD) (PE218.768 ) - Exchange of views 11. Middle East peace process (T03974) INI0376 INI0376 + POLI Fond R COLAJANNI Luigi. (PSE) (PE217.046/A ) - Adoption of draft report Adoption of draft report (5) 12. Future financing of the European Union in respect of enlargement (T04589) INI0445 INI0445 + POLI Avis A OOSTLANDER Arie. (PPE) (PE219.006 ) F BUDG Fond R CHRISTODOULOU Efthym (PPE) (PE218.268/RV1) - Adoption of draft opinion 13. Communication on EU-Canada relations and their development (T04513) ATT1135 SEC(96)0331 + POLI Fond R GRAZIANI Antonio. (PPE) (PE219.008/DT ) - Exchange of views 14. Former Yugoslavia: prospects for developing regional cooperation and ways o f encouraging cooperation (T04778) COS0421 SEC(96)0252 C4-0274/96 + POLI Fond R COHN-BENDIT Daniel M (V ) - Exchange of views 15. Exchange of views with Mrs LENZ, chairman of the Subcommittee on Human Righ ts, on matters currently under consideration by the subcommittee 16. Exchange of views with Mr BERTENS, chairman of the Subcommittee on Security and Disarmament, on matters currently under consideration by the subcommittee 17. Appointment of rapporteurs and draftsmen - decisions on procedure 18. Any other business 19. Date of next meeting (PE/I/OJ/96-18 )

[FOOTNOTES]1. ) Coordinators' meeting on Tuesday 29 October, at the end of the meeting. 2. ) Enlarged bureau meeting on Wednesday 30 October, from 9 to 9.30 a.m. 3. ) Unless decided otherwise. 4. ) Pursuant to Article J.7 of the Treaty on European Union. 5. ) Vote on 30 October at 9.30 a.m. - FIN - END OF DOCUMENT.
